rows.label: qst701001_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, it's you guys.
You're really making a name for
yourselves lately.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0002
rows.name:
I heard about the evacuation ship
you helped put together. People
can't seem to stop talking about it.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0003
rows.name:
I hope they're saying good things.
Though I suspect the truth is a little
more complicated than that.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0004
rows.name: Hahaha! You're a sharp one.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0005
rows.name:
Of course, there are lots of folks
who are real grateful to you. People
like being prepared for an emergency.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0006
rows.name:
But there are plenty of people who
can't or won't leave the city. Something
should be done to help them.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0007
rows.name: No should! Something will be done!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0008
rows.name:
Morumo is chairman of commerce here.
Role include obligation to make sure all
folk able to live restful, peaceful lives.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0009
rows.name:
To that end, Morumo have wonderful
idea. Only had to skip five meetings to
come up with idea.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0010
rows.name: What we need is impregnable shelter!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm not so sure you should be skipping
all those meetings...

rows.label: qst701001_msg0012
rows.name:
Morumo will read minutes of meetings
later. Or not. Anyway, that not current
action point!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0013
rows.name:
I certainly like the idea of building an
emergency shelter in the middle of
town. Seems like you lot could help.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0014
rows.name:
First thing we need for shelter is help
of builder. Maybe ask Zain?

rows.label: qst701001_msg0015
rows.name: Zain? The name is familiar...

rows.label: qst701001_msg0016
rows.name:
Isn't he Rita's father? Remember
how her Blade named the Waytree
in honor of him?

rows.label: qst701001_msg0017
rows.name: You know Rita? I should have guessed!

rows.label: qst701001_msg0018
rows.name:
You've got the right Zain, at any
rate. He's one of the district's foremost
artisans, but he's...tricky.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0019
rows.name:
Hehehe. No worry. Morumo and
Zain are walky-stroll buddies.
He definitely lend hand to endeavor.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0020
rows.name:
OK then! We'll go and talk to Zain,
I guess.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0021
rows.name: Just you today? This is unusual.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0022
rows.name: OK then.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0023
rows.name:
Don't go out of your way trying to find
Milt. Just savor the peace and quiet.

rows.label: qst701001_msg0024
rows.name: Well, we're off. See you later!
